CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 9, 1946, pg. 32, reads: "Gay Party - A party was given [word omitted - for?]  C. Bates at 2156 Wylie Avenue, in honor of his birthday, recently. Several out-of-town guests attended, including Mrs. Georgie Alford of Cleveland and Mr. and Mrs. Percy Bedford of Donora. The party was given by Mrs. Bates. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women, possibly including Mrs. Bates, Mrs. Alford, Mrs. Bedford, and Althea Hickman Barnwell, and men including C. Bates and Percy Bedford, gathered in living room for birthday party of C. Bates in home at 2156 Wylie Avenue, Hill District
